name: UpdateiOSIcons
description: Update the iOS app icons in the assets.car file. Works with source code or compiled ipa file.
author: Scott MacDougall

inputs.name: sourceOrIpa
inputs.label: Location of assets being replaced
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select Source if you want to update the assets in your source code before compiling. Select IPA if you're looking to replace the assets in an ipa file

inputs.name: ipaPath
inputs.label: Path to IPA
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the ipa file you want to replace the assets in.

inputs.name: iconPath
inputs.label: Icon
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the file you want to use as a new icon.

inputs.name: assetsPath
inputs.label: Path to Assets.xcassets folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to Assets.xcassets folder where App Icon will be replaced.

inputs.name: cwdPath
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Working directory. Defaults to the root of the repository.

inputs.name: appIconName
inputs.label: App Icon Asset Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the App Icon asset

outputVariables.name: repackagedIpaFile
outputVariables.description: The resulting ipa file after assets update. This needs to be re-signed.
